channel.title: drone on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in drone on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-26
item.description: Adorable redesigned emoji—including Clippy—included in latest Windows 11 update (2 minute read) Microsoft will add redesigned emoji in the next Windows 11 update.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-05
item.description: Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and Oculus are down. Here’s what we know (2 minute read) Facebook and all of its services went down today.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-20
item.description: OnlyFans bans sexually explicit content to appease banks and payment services (3 minute read) OnlyFans will ban sexually explicit material on its platform from October 1 to comply with the requests of its banking partners and payout providers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-26
item.description: Samsung’s new partnership offers another glimpse of a drone delivery future — in only one Irish town (2 minute read) Samsung has partnered with Irish drone delivery company Manna to bring drone delivery of small electronics like phones and smartwatches to a small town in Ireland.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-12
item.description: Samsung’s CES 2021 robots will clean your house and pour you a glass of wine (6 minute read) Samsung unveiled three new robots at its virtual CES press conference on Monday.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-09
item.description: Waymo’s robo-taxi service opens to the public in Phoenix (3 minute read) Waymo is relaunching its fully automated robo-taxi ride-hailing service in Phoenix.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-10
item.description: Spotify are reportedly working on a new karaoke feature (1 minute read) Spotify is working on a Karaoke Mode that will feature lyrics and adjustable vocal levels for songs.
